channel.title: Decay: Source
channel.description:
Just to disclose to those who do not know yet, there is a group named Hazard Team that is doing the Decay: Source mod.
You can find more info here: [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/hazard-team1']MODDB[/url]
I can´t wait for this.

item.title: Decay: Source
item.dc:creator: mr.Hazard
item.description:
hazard team? ok… i didnt know i had my own team

heres some teasers : https://i.imgur.com/6HhEWh.jpg trololol

Read full topic

item.title: Decay: Source
item.dc:creator: Nobuga
item.description:
neuroboy:

Er… I didn’t know about Decay: Source. In fact, I didn’t even know about the original Decay! I hang my head in shame, clutching my original boxed copy of Half-Life so you know I am not just a sad n00b, hoping that you can forgive my ignorance regarding its existence as it was officially only a PS2 game.

(I’m now downloading the unnofficial PC port as I type this.)

Better late than never, buddy.

Read full topic
